name: Urban War Defense (itch)
description:
Why Early Access?

“To test stability and to test game play such as balancing,difficulty and certain features.

The game is fully functioning and has all standard tower defense game play working multiple towers and enemies are included in the early access build however there will be more added.

The early access version includes multiple levels, some will likely be changed from the final release and the final release will include far more levels featuring different environments for the full campaign story line.

There are many features planned to be added which are not included in the early access version however some features planned to be added are being tested and will be added on an update for testing.

I need feedback on balancing and game play as well as feedback on level design, sounds and any feedback on and suggestions on improvements and additions.”

Approximately how long will this game be in Early Access?

“It is likely to take a around half a year at least but probably more as a majority of levels still need to be made as well as game play improvements and additions.”

How is the full version planned to differ from the Early Access version?

“Full story line changes based on feedback and more features and content far more levels featuring different environments for the story campaign there will also be more enemies and towers included in the final release.”

What is the current state of the Early Access version?

“Basic tower defense game play works fully and there are a few enemies and towers to choose from as well as a few levels to play and test the game with.”

Will the game be priced differently during and after Early Access?

“Price of the full game will be slightly higher, early access buyers get the game cheaper.”

How are you planning on involving the Community in your development process?

“I plan to take feedback regarding gameplay, balancing and features in the game and feedback on level design and possible additions and changes to the game.”

Lead through a action packed fast paced tower defense game with a story of an invasion on your homeland by a large foreign force and as a newly appointed commander do what you can to help your country fight back and defend against this enemy force which is approaching from the coast.
